channel.title: Crash at the massive fan part
channel.description: Hey. Just reporting that the game crashes at the massive fan part (not sure how to word it better, sorry). It can easily be avoided, but whenever I turn the fan on, if I drop a wooden crate or pallet onto the fan as it starts to spin, the game will crash every single time for me. Nothing too nasty. Just thought I'd mention it here regardless. I attached a couple of minidumps from that crash. Hope it helps! Great job on that mod, by the way. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T15_14_56C0.mdmp (81.7 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T14_50_13C0.mdmp (80.6 KB)

item.title: Crash at the massive fan part
item.dc:creator: FakeXYZ
item.description:
Scratch the part about throwing stuff into the fan. I thought it came from that because I was throwing stuff into it every time, but I just tried passing through that part without messing around with objects and I still crashed.
I activate the switch under the fan, run for the ladder and get on top. After a few seconds as the fan starts speeding, my game crashes.

EDIT: Well, I just tried one more time and managed to pass that part without any crash. Weird…

Read full topic
item.source: Crash at the massive fan part

item.title: Crash at the massive fan part
item.dc:creator: vktech
item.description:
Hm, that’s odd. I can’t understand what’s going on there. I’m sure the developers appreciate the input though!

Read full topic

item.title: Crash at the massive fan part
item.dc:creator: FakeXYZ
item.description:
Hey.
Just reporting that the game crashes at the massive fan part (not sure how to word it better, sorry).
It can easily be avoided, but whenever I turn the fan on, if I drop a wooden crate or pallet onto the fan as it starts to spin, the game will crash every single time for me.
Nothing too nasty. Just thought I’d mention it here regardless.
I attached a couple of minidumps from that crash. Hope it helps!

Great job on that mod, by the way.
